brief_description: FCS and workspaces files from T cell ICS Flow Cytometry
brief_title: Flow Cytometry of T cells for TB Resistance Study
description:
Intracellular Cytokine Staining data for human T cell responses to antigens specific to and not specific to Mycobacterium tuberculosis. COMPASS analysis shows that Ugandan TB ?resisters? exhibit IFNg-independent CD4 T cell responses, suggesting exposure to TB antigens despite negative test results.  
  
See the accompanying article published in Nature Medicine, titled "IFN-?-independent immune markers of Mycobacterium tuberculosis exposure". https://www.nature.com/articles/s41591-019-0441-3  

Code to reproduce the COMPASS analysis is here: https://github.com/seshadrilab/ResisterCOMPASSAnalysis
endpoints: FCS data characterizing T cell function
hypothesis: TB resisters exhibit unique functional T cell responses to TB antigens.
objectives: Characterize T cell responses to TB and Non-TB antigens in TB-resistant individuals from Uganda.
official_title: Flow Cytometry of T cells for TB Resistance Study

pubmed.title: IFN-?-independent immune markers of Mycobacterium tuberculosis exposure.

program.program_name: Mechanisms of Immune Protection from TB among HIV-infected Individuals (R01) RFA-AI-14-072
program.contract_name: Resistance To MTB Infection In HIV Infected Individuals In Uganda And S. Africa
